data.name: RPG Maker MV - Heroes and Villains voices 【Japanese】vol.2
data.detailed_description:
Why not expand your Japanese palette with Vol 2 of Heroes and Villains Japanese language voice pack from Kadokawa! Featuring more male and female voiceovers spoken in Japanese, this pack has over 180 more expressions covering many of the most important and common phrases your characters will need during their journeys.

Features:

* 29 Brave Male phrases
* 29 Warrior Male phrases
* 29 Swordsman Male phrases
* 29 Male Mage phrases
* 29 Brave Female phrases
* 20 Male Villain phrases
* 20 Female Villain phrases
* All files come in both High Res and Low res versions
* All phrases are spoken in Japanese
* .m4a and .ogg formats included
* For use with RPG Maker and Visual Novel games.

Tracklist viewable as screenshot (Japanese text only)
